Ok thanks about the tip
It's pretty clear, I'll manage

I encountered another problem a while ago
It logs too much on the file heritrix_out.log (not the one in the /bin
directory), the one on the root directory that I have heritrix on.
How can I disable that huge amount of logging? We're talking about 1.5G
in less than a minute.

Thanks in advance
